[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/exit.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/exit/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install exit```#### Features+ better than `atexit.register`+ `SIGKILL`, `SIGSTOP` or `os._exit()` not supported#### Examples```python>>> import exit>>> def on_exit(): print("goodbye world")>>> exit.register(on_exit)```#### Links+ [How to always execute exit functions in Python](http://grodola.blogspot.com/2016/02/how-to-always-execute-exit-functions-in-py.html)
